CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream.synopsis: Lae'zel approaches you in camp. You are showing symptoms of ceremorphosis. So is everyone else. She threatens to kill everyone unless you convince her to stand down. She is afraid, though does not wish you to know it.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_22.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_22.text: *The air is heavy. Moisture drips down your forehead; pain shoots through your fingers.*
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player stumbles through the forest, proping themselves against a tree

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_4.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_4.text: Wipe the sweat from your brow.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_60.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_60.text: *Your hands shake as they reach upward. Your forehead remains drenched, no matter how much you wipe.*
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily wipes their forehead

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_1.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_1.text: *The ache builds as you squeeze your hands together. Were your fingers always so thick, your skin always so sticky?*
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily rubs their hands

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_32.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: | Lae'zel appears behind you, blade to your throat. (Or similar threatening position.) She is poised to strike. |NodeContext: CHK-ill gayk VLAH-kith mm zah-THOCK! Mind flayer - abomination to Vlaakith!

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_25.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_25.text: Can you feel it crawling through you? Tendrils squirming in your chest, gripping your heart, piercing your belly? Your bones popping, your flesh swelling?

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_61.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_61.text: I can. I see it in you. I feel it in me. We are lost.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_50.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_50.text: I will be quick with my blade. First you. Then the others. Then myself.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_15.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_15.text: *Your minds intertwine. You sense a touch of uncertainty, a touch of disgust.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_19.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_19.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_41.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_41.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_27.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_27.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_9.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_9.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_56.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_56.text: *Lae'zel's fear grips you. Not fear of death, but fear of insignificance.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_23.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_23.text: *The great warrior Lae'zel, a failure to her kind. She will wield no silver sword, ride no red dragon, forever unknown to the great lich queen Vlaakith.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_55.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_55.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_54.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_54.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_66.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_66.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_65.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_65.text: *Lae'zel's mind holds you at length. Her thoughts remain unknown.*

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_8.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_8.text: Be strong. You will survive this. You will please your queen!

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_18.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_18.text: I will not let the ghaik take me. I will earn Vlaakith's honour.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_6.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_6.text: I will wait. But know this: I am watching. If the sickness does not pass come dawn...

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_44.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_44.text: Bah - I cannot trust my own mind. So it seems I must trust yours.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_64.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_64.text: We're just exhausted. Lower the blade before you do something foolish.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_57.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_57.text: It feels as if a snake is slithering through every limb. My throat burns like flames erupted within.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_28.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_28.text: This is not exhaustion. This is ceremorphosis.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_43.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_43.text: It's just a fever. Rest will break it.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_42.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_42.text: This is no simple fever. This is ceremorphosis.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_5.text: Don't you see how far gone you are? Give me that blade - I'll make it quick.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_46.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_46.text: The monster in you craves birth. I trust no one but me to deny it.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel lets the player up handing them her knife

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_3.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_3.text: Take it. One motion. Across the neck.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_35.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_35.text: No one is dying tonight. We still have time.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_13.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_13.text: Chk - a splendid ruse. My anger is surpassed only by my respect.
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player stows blade and rises with LazaelNodeContext: You deceived her. Lae'zel is both angry and impressed.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_20.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_20.text: I will not be ghaik. Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai!
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player executes Lae'zel with one slice of the blade.NodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_39.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_39.text: Surrender to Lae'zel. You will not become an abomination.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_33.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_33.text: Let it be so. Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai!
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel kills the player and walks away, steaming. Game OverNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_7.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player throws Laezel off and takes a combative stanceNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_52.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_52.text: Press your fingers to your mouth.

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_12.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_12.text: *Your finger traces the arc of your lips. Wetness: sweat, blood, and saliva mixed into one viscous liquid.*
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily rubs their lips

CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_16.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_16.text: *The world swims as you close, then reopen your eyes. How long have you been waiting here? A moment? A night? A tenday?*
CRD_Laezel_BeforeDream_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakes their head trying to find their bearings
